word_mean: 提早发作：在预期时间之前的发作

PerfectNetExp.abs: prolepses 预料prolepsis 预期proleptic 预期的
...prolactin release inhibitor factor 催乳激素释放抑制因子prolepsis 提早发作-
...is）、“复原”（analepsis）概念，他说：“复原”是指故事中某件事 …5倒述时间倒错包括了“预述”（prolepsis）和“倒述”（analepsis）两种情况。预述指预先讲述或提及后来发生事件的任何叙述活动，倒述指对.
prolepsis 预辩法 prosopopoeia 示现 pun 双关 repetition 反复 rhetorical question 修辞问句 represented speech 描述性引语 ridicule 嘲弄 satire 讥讽 second term.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a term in rhetoric): via late Latin from Greek prolēpsis, from prolambanein 'anticipate', from pro 'before' + lambanein 'take'

means.word_mean: 1. anticipating and answering objections in advance
